title: ChildFund Sri Lanka promotes active teaching and learning approaches
snippet: Helping students gain a strong foundation during their primary schooling, ChildFund Sri Lanka (CFSL) adapted a concept by International Literacy Association (ILA). The concept of 'Active Teaching and Learning Approaches in Schools' (ATLAS) for primary school children were developed and tested in different contexts.

title: Sri Lanka dealt a spiritual blow as death of 68-year-old revered elephant adds to tourism-dependent nation's woes
snippet: The passing of Nadungamuwa Raja, who was reportedly the tallest domesticated elephant in Asia, has dealt a spiritual blow to the tourism-dependent nation still reeling from war and terrorism.

title: Sri Lanka central bank ends ban on forward forex sales to importers
snippet: Sri Lanka central bank has lifted a ban on foreign exchange trading and allowed banks to sell forward to importers from March 22, in a new direction issued to banks, ending one of several cascading policy errors that led to an economic crisis.

title: Sri Lanka reforms anti-terror law as EU reviews trade scheme

title: Sri Lanka falls into China's debt-trap policy as financial crisis reaches new highs

title: Column | Ballooning govt debt, populist measures mainly caused Sri Lanka's economic crisis
